solution_line_template: Since each novel has {pages_per_novel} pages, you read {num_novels}*{pages_per_novel} = <<{num_novels}*{pages_per_novel}={pages_per_month}>>{pages_per_month} pages of novels every month.
Since a year has {months_per_year} months, you will read {pages_per_month}*{months_per_year} = <<{pages_per_month}*{months_per_year}={pages_per_year}>>{pages_per_year} pages in a year.
